name: Turkey Pile
ingredients: 1 1/2 - 2 c. chicken broth (or drippings from cooked turkey)
instructions: Cook onion in 1/3 c. butter until tender but not brown. Stir in flour. Add broth, salt, and half/half; cook and stir constantly until sauce thickens and bubbles. Add turkey and heat, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, in small bowl blend egg yolks, paprika and 1/4 c. butter; set aside.

Add to turkey mixture lemon juice. Heat gravy to bubbling, then add yolk mixture all at once, stirring until blended. Immediately remove from heat. Arrange pile-on ingredients buffet-style and allow guests to serve themselves.
